original_text:
On the great waters
    came the grain of the Shihor;
the harvest of the Nile was the revenue of Tyre,
    and she became the marketplace of the nations.
korean_text: 시홀의 곡식 곧 나일의 추수를 큰 물로 수송하여 들였으니 열국의 시장이 되었도다

sentences.original_text: came the grain of the Shihor
the harvest of the Nile was the revenue of Tyre
and she became the marketplace of the nations
